pages.title: Ender Dragon
pages.text: Level: <level_t1>$(br2)To enter the End, you must first collect $(bold)12$() $(key)special eyes$(). These $(key)special eyes$() come from various boss loot.$(br2)After defeating $(boss/t1/day_night)Day Stalker & Night Prowler$(), craft and use $(key)Endless Starlight$() to unlock the $(key)Endgame Phase$() and grant yourself the $(bold)authority$() to enter the End.

pages.title: Dragon Egg & Dragon Scales
pages.text: $(br)$(key)Ender Dragon$() always has the $(key)Black Hole$() trait. When its fireballs explode, they cast $(key)Black Hole$() â€” be careful and dodge.$(br2)Defeating $(key)Ender Dragon$() drops a $(key)Dragon Egg$() (used to summon $(boss/t1/the_eye)The Eye$()), and also drops $(key)Dragon Scales$() which can be used to craft the $(mechanic/loot_charm)Miracle Loot Charm$().
